execution_plan.description: Retrieve every order's id and order date together with the product_id for each order item (one row per order item).
execution_plan.query: SELECT o.order_id, o.date_order_placed, oi.product_id FROM Orders AS o INNER JOIN Order_Items AS oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id;

execution_plan.description: Fetch prices for all products referenced by the order items returned in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_id IN ($step1.product_id);
